Feature pill components implement Framer Motion morphing entrance animation. Initial state: borderRadius 50% (circle), scale 0.8, opacity 0. Final state: borderRadius 12px (pill), scale 1, opacity 1. Duration 0.6s with spring physics (Framer Motion default spring), 0.08s stagger between pills. Styling: glassmorphism background, gradient border (cyan/fuchsia). Verification: Scroll into hero/process steps, verify circle → pill morph, stagger visible, spring bounce effect.

Step card reveals implement elastic easing (CRE8TIVE_EASINGS.spring / elastic.out fallback) with visible bounce effect. Initial state: opacity 0, y: 40, scale 0.95. Final state: opacity 1, y: 0, scale 1. Easing: elastic.out(1, 0.5), 0.15s stagger between cards. ScrollTrigger: Each step animates on scroll into viewport. Verification: Scroll through process flow, verify visible bounce/spring effect on each reveal, elastic easing characteristic overshoot.

constraints.constraint: All components must follow Component Template pattern: TypeScript interface for props (exported), JSDoc comment, semantic HTML, cn() utility, responsive classes, lazy-load images, useEffect cleanup for GSAP context.
GSAP animations MUST use gsap.context() with cleanup in useEffect return. Never nest ScrollTriggers inside timeline tweens. Animate transform and opacity only for GPU acceleration.

60fps non-negotiable for all animations. Frame budget ≤16.67ms. Timeline draw-on: ≤3ms, pill morphing: stagger to avoid simultaneous renders, title stagger: ≤2ms, step reveals: ≤5ms. Use will-change: transform on animated elements.

Mobile (375px): 1 column stack, static pills (no morphing), timeline connector simplified (no draw-on), step reveals use simple fade-in. Tablet (768px): 1 column, pill morphing enabled, timeline draw-on enabled, elastic step reveals. Desktop (1024px+): Full premium animations.

prefers-reduced-motion MUST be respected. If detected, disable all premium animations: no pill morphing, instant timeline (no draw-on), no elastic bounce, no word stagger. Use usePrefersReducedMotion hook.

All hero and process step copy must match COPY_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md EXACTLY (word-for-word). No paraphrasing or creative interpretation. Headlines, subheadlines, feature highlights, step titles, summaries, descriptions, deliverables, outputs, insights must be pixel-perfect match.

Timeline connector uses SVG stroke-dashoffset (not canvas). Feature pills use Framer Motion morphing (not GSAP). Hero title stagger word-by-word (not line-by-line). Elastic step reveals with elastic.out(1, 0.5) parameters.
Components <500 LOC, functions <50 lines, files <500 lines total. Extract sub-components if BriefingHero or TimelineConnector exceed limits.
TypeScript: noImplicitAny false (relaxed mode), but fix errors. ESLint: 0 errors required, warnings acceptable. Build: tsc && vite build must succeed. No console.log in production code.
